metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Five Ways to Make Chicken and Peas
Cheese Noodles with Chard and Lemon

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Boil potatoes until tender, then slice.  o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.  o Sauté sliced potatoes and diced onion in butter until golden.  o Stir in bacon, salt, and pepper.  o Serve warm.    Briam
•  In a bowl, combine the chicken, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion.  •  Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.  •  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
tender.  o Stir in chopped cilantro.  o Tear flatbread into pieces and place in a serving dish.  o Pour chicken and sauce over the bread and serve warm.    Rice and Peas
o Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber.  o Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt.  o Serve chilled.    Käsespätzle (Cheese Noodles)

•  In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat.  •  Add cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion to the eggs.  •  Cook until the eggs are set and the vegetables are tender.  •  Place the egg mixture in the center of the tortilla and roll it up.  •  Serve with salsa.
•  In a bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion.  •  Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.  •  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
•  Lay a slice of turkey flat and spread with hummus.  •  Place a slice of cheese and a few spinach leaves on top.  •  Roll up tightly and repeat with remaining ingredients.
•  In a bowl, combine the chicken, mango, red onion, and cilantro.  •  Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.  •  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
